name: Vsratland / Всратлэнд (demo)
description:
This is a 2D shooter about a stripper in a zombie apocalypse. The game is written in Python, using the Pygame framework. 

People were not grieving, they were doing nonsense, until suddenly inverted zombies began to walk through the streets of the city. Quickly realizing that the virus came from Australia, the residents of Rutland forgot the real name of their city.

Stripper Ricardo "Boner" Bones lost his job because of what was happening, and decided to fulfill his childhood dream: to become a policeman to serve and protect his people. Fortunately, the form is already there.

Take a barrel in one hand, a pistol in the other and clear the streets of Vsratland of infected shit so that the residents of the city continue to do their favorite shit. 

To serve, protect, kill, kill, kill...

(c) Officer Ricardo "Boner" Bones

Who is working on the game:

Michael Realperson - game designer, programming, animation

Cyril Unicorn - artist, ideological inspirer

Vadim Sigaev - composer

kwaidan - voice acting (Ricardo "Boner" Bones), ideological inspirer

KatRinRed - voice acting (Denise Patchinghole)
